name: RATANO
description:
In the beginning, there was him... Ratano!

Go on an adventure with Ratano, a little rat boy who has spent a lot of time doing science to impress his friends and teachers! But then something happens... 𝐼 𝑑𝑜 𝑡𝘩𝑖𝑛𝑘 𝑦𝑜𝑢 𝑎𝑟𝑒 𝑛𝑒𝑤 𝘩𝑒𝑟𝑒... ... 𝑎𝑟𝑒𝑛'𝑡 𝑦𝑜𝑢? 𝐴𝑛𝑦𝑤𝑎𝑦, 𝐼 𝑎𝑚 𝑖𝑛𝑡𝑟𝑖𝑔𝑢𝑒𝑑 𝑡𝑜 𝑠𝑒𝑒 𝑡𝘩𝑒 𝑝𝑎𝑡𝘩 𝑦𝑜𝑢 𝑤𝑖𝑙𝑙 𝑡𝑎𝑘𝑒... 𝑜𝑟 𝘩𝑎𝑣𝑒 𝑦𝑜𝑢 𝑎𝑙𝑟𝑒𝑎𝑑𝑦 𝑡𝑎𝑘𝑒𝑛 𝑖𝑡? Meanwhile, discover new faces at the Midefalls college, a place full of exciting and crazy people!

Controls

Z - CONFIRM       •       WASD AND ARROW KEYS - MOVE

I hope you all enjoy this short journey with many comedic moments and intriguing characters! This is my first game and I hope to improve so much in the next one.

You can play RATANO on your PC or Mobile, the game is available in English and Brazilian Portuguese.

  • Game by diegolazuli
  • Soundtrack by L30NN
  • Cover art by mintNchocchips
•  Chat about the game in our Discord server!
•  Midefalls official website! midefalls.com
•  You can report bugs and give feedback! diegolazulihelp@gmail.com

Don't forget to rate the game and leave a comment!
